message: I think a 55/45 split is a fairer reflection of our contributions.
Considering inflation, I deserve a bigger share
Let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to give you a slight edge to account for inflation, but a 57/43 split seems fair.
Inflation is hitting you harder, I need a better deal
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to give you 4000 to avoid getting nothing at all, but I need a larger share to make up for the inflation hitting me hard.
